remarks: Distributive law for natural numbers (left-distributivity).  Theorem 4K(3) of [Enderton] p. 81.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Sep-1995.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Nov-2014.)
statement: nndi $p |- ( ( A e. _om /\ B e. _om /\ C e. _om ) -> ( A .o ( B +o C ) ) = ( ( A .o B ) +o ( A .o C ) ) ) $.
